name: Vitality Cranker (playjam 2)
description:
This entry for the playjam 2 is a platformer developped with Cotton.
https://itch.io/jam/playjam-2
https://github.com/unbelievableflavour/Cotton
You are vigor a toy robot that lost a lot of his vitality.
Find batteries and get back home as fast as possible !
You'll always have to crank to get your stamina back !

I got some inspiration from SquidGodDev repos https://github.com/SquidGodDev

music was made during the jam

Some Sound use are from free sound around the web and other made for the jam and other are mix.
